metadata.title: CVE-2016-5735 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: Integer overflow in the rwpng_read_image24_libpng function in rwpng.c in pngquant 2.7.0 allows remote attackers to have unspecified impact via a crafted PNG file, which triggers a buffer overflow.

criterions.comment: pngquant package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.5.0-2').
